posts.post_content:
The other day me and my buddies were playing EDH and my one friend swung me with a [Reassembling Skeleton](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reassembling Skeleton) with a [Gravepact](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gravepact) on the battlefield. Not wanting to lose my [Sun titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sun titan) so easily I let it through, only to witness him dump 39 life into hatred. Funniest play ever.  
  
This card isn't just good, it's fun. Even those on the recieving end will keel over laughing when you swing them with a 19/2 [Ornithopter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ornithopter), or as me and my pals like to call it, a Hatredthopter.
posts.html:
The other day me and my buddies were playing EDH and my one friend swung me with a Reassembling Skeleton with a Gravepact on the battlefield. Not wanting to lose my Sun titan so easily I let it through, only to witness him dump 39 life into hatred. Funniest play ever.

This card isn't just good, it's fun. Even those on the recieving end will keel over laughing when you swing them with a 19/2 Ornithopter, or as me and my pals like to call it, a Hatredthopter.

posts.post_content:
A great card to use in mono black with the shadow creatures (look up dauthi, it basically means your creatures are unblockable and can't block).   
  
Throw in Dark Ritual and Blood Pet for acceleration and you've got a GREAT aggro/combo beginners deck.   
  
It's cheap, easy to put together, and simple to play. It's a Trifecta!
posts.html:
A great card to use in mono black with the shadow creatures (look up dauthi, it basically means your creatures are unblockable and can't block).

Throw in Dark Ritual and Blood Pet for acceleration and you've got a GREAT aggro/combo beginners deck.

It's cheap, easy to put together, and simple to play. It's a Trifecta!

posts.post_content:
Ridiculous Turn 1 win (on the draw)  
Mountain, [Rite of Flame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rite of Flame), [Manamorphose](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Manamorphose), [Goblin Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Guide),[Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual),[Dark Ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Ritual), [Hatred](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hatred).  
  
Mountain, Drop the Rite of Flame, Manamorphose for R and B, Goblin Guide, Dark Ritual, Dark Ritual, Hatred For 19, Swing for 21.  
  
I suppose it would work with any hastey 1 drop (of any color even).

posts.post_content:
This card actually makes 1st turn win possible.   
  
[Mountian](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mountian), [Raging Goblin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Raging Goblin) followed by [Black Lotus](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Black Lotus) and one [Dark ritual](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark ritual), attack, play this, insta win. Your opponent can't do anything since his turn hasnt even come, and he doesn't have any mana to do anything about this.   
  
Pretty amaizing finisher.

posts.post_content:
@ DrJack  
  
I think it's because Hatred costs ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol)![Black](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=B&type=symbol) and [Channel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Channel) costs ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol). It's like how [Time Walk](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Walk) is banned and [Time Warp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Time Warp) isn't.  
  
On the other hand, Hatred is exceptionally powerful in EDH. All you need is your general to swing in unblocked ([Geth, Lord of the Vault](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Geth, Lord of the Vault) and [Mikaeus, the Unhallowed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mikaeus, the Unhallowed) preferably because of Intimidate) and you could kill a player like that.
posts.html:
@ DrJack

I think it's because Hatred costs and Channel costs . It's like how Time Walk is banned and Time Warp isn't.

On the other hand, Hatred is exceptionally powerful in EDH. All you need is your general to swing in unblocked (Geth, Lord of the Vault and Mikaeus, the Unhallowed preferably because of Intimidate) and you could kill a player like that.
